title: Ep43 Gossip at the Corpse Cart
description:
This month’s GACC delivers some problematic signage, a fleecy murderer, cautionary Grindr tales, significant vampire memorabilia, and another bitter obit. Tune in for July’s Gossip at the Corpse Cart! 

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
